price: 16. (Los mensajeros) dijeron: «Nuestro Señor sabe bien que hemos sido enviados a vosotros como mensajeros.
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbunā yaʿlamu innā ilaykum lamur'salūna
